attributes.action: Implement  'Child Contract Of Care' Conditions For Child + Housing Benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With Child and Housing Benefits, a Contract of Care, for the children they’re getting benefit for, should be a condition.

Any parent found guilty of neglect would be in breach of the contract and have the benefits stopped.

Parents have a duty to try and bring up their children as well rounded citizens; no parent attempting anything less should be acceptable let alone subsidised by the tax payer.
